rows.label: qst100801_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey there! You lot look like you're well
used to the open road!

rows.label: qst100801_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, where are my manners!
Kapha's the name. I'm a traveler of
sorts, too.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0004
rows.name:
A certain doctor from Gula asked us
to source him some Healing Herb. So
me and my pal Shal said we'd oblige.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0005
rows.name:
We're both strangers here in Gula.
We're not too sure where to look for
medicinal herbs in these parts.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0006
rows.name:
While we were searching, somehow
Shal managed to wander off all
the way over there.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0007
rows.name:
I've been calling out for ages, but with
no response.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0008
rows.name:
It's a wee bit embarrassing, but I'm no
good at clambering up things.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0009
rows.name:
By the time I get to where she is, she'll
probably have moved off somewhere
else.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0010
rows.name: Really? Aye, that's a great help to me!

rows.label: qst100801_msg0011
rows.name:
I can see Shal from here, so if she
moves, I'll give you a shout.

rows.label: qst100801_msg0012
rows.name:
Oh, rats! She's no good at fighting
either, but she's gone and hared off...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0013
rows.name: And left me all by myself...

rows.label: qst100801_msg0015
rows.name:
Could you go and tell Shal to come
back here? Cheers!
